"%1$s package found, install with it, or download the latest version?"
Go to your email and confirm the link, then the new password will be sent to the mail!
Click ok,then the password will send to your email !
New password is same as old password, please reset
All local apps are up to date
After changing server, it needs register again or sign up with a valid account.
Clear phone memory, release more space.

The version is up to date!

Together, should not be so lonely!\n\nJoin now.
Failed to get account from Borqs Account service, it properly causes by signature conflict. You could cancel the dialog, and run without account.

Please login with a Borqs account.

Find more fun applications from your friends, recommend you download WuTong, click the url to download, %1$s

No valid network, check the settings and retry.
Automatically backup those applications (.apk) in your device that is newer than those in remote server.
Backup the applications (.apk) to a remote server. You can choose to restore them at any time to any of your phone or pad.
Backup over mobile network will use your data connection. You can turn this off at any time in Settings.

For new version update, you need uninstall previous install borqs sync application
For new version update, you need uninstall previous install borqs notification service.
This guy is lazy,did not say anything...
" All applications were up to date.\n\n We are hungry for your voice."
" Auto backup apps were restored.\n\n We are hungry for your voice."
Existing Borqs Account will be remove while switching to the other server. Please activate a valid account on the server later.
Release server was in use, switch to internal debug server now?
Debug server was in use, switch to formal release server?
Have a try for SNS share platform，extra Bpc icon will show in all apps list of Launcher.
Configure HTTP log, Switch servers, Enable developing feature try.
The formal server is ready for use, let\'s go and play there.（The current account on test server will be kept, and could be switched back via Setting option）
Stream presentation is on going，any comments and suggestion are welcome.
Select this, will show tab style. Need restart the application
System download service take responsibility to download applications
How do you store and share my info?

You agree that Borqs may use your application information to improve Borqs\'s products and services. Borqs use of your information is subject to Borqs\'s Privacy Policy - http://www.borqs.com. Borqs may share the information you provide with the third party developer(s) of this application. Such third party developer(s) use of your information will be subject to its own privacy policy.
To receive notifications, request and others info instantly, please enable this service, which might consume some battery energy
Can\'t determine your location. Do you want to adjust your settings now?

Must have a recipient and share secretly!
You have selected contact(s), so it must be shared secretly.

Enable high quality mode with WIFI network condition, which might load possible high quality data from server, e.g., picture.
Enable auto saved data flow mode with mobile network condition in order to limit the data usage.
To save data usage, enable this mode, so some huge data won\'t be loaded
